column4: anyone know of something deployable that will give users the ability to upload files via a web interface?
php will do that with ease ... just look on google for a php based file upload script
I say "deployable" because I don't want to use a library and develop the capability.
you are running a webserver, HTTP POST FileUpload in apache is what does what you want, but really there isn't any development to do what you want, as it has already been done
